item.title: [j22] Chandra's Pyrohelix
item.description:
Instant

Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Pyreling
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Lizard

Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [j22] Chandra's Magmutt
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Dog

{T}: Chandra's Magmutt deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [j22] Chandra, Flame's Fury
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Chandra

+1: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 2 damage to any target.

−2: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

−8: Chandra, Flame's Fury deals 10 damage to target player and each creature that player controls.

item.title: [j22] Challenger Troll
item.description:
Creature — Troll

Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

item.title: [j22] Certain Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Cemetery Recruitment
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Cellar Door
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Target player puts the bottom card of their library into their graveyard. If it's a creature card, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [j22] Cavalry Drillmaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

item.title: [j22] Caustic Caterpillar
item.description:
Creature — Insect

{1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [j22] Caught in the Brights
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

When a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.

item.title: [j22] Catalyst Elemental
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R}{R}.

item.title: [j22] Captivating Unicorn
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [j22] Captain Lannery Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

Haste

Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Canopy Baloth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Canopy Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Campus Guide
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

item.title: [j22] Cage of Hands
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

{1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

item.title: [j22] Bury in Books
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.

Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.

item.title: [j22] Burn Bright
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Built to Last
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [j22] Brood Monitor
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Drone

Devoid (This card has no color.)

When Brood Monitor enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [j22] Broken Bond
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [j22] Bristling Boar
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

item.title: [j22] Bring to Trial
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [j22] Brineborn Cutthroat
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.

item.title: [j22] Brightmare
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

When Brightmare enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.

item.title: [j22] Briarpack Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Brazen Wolves
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Brazen Freebooter
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [j22] Bounding Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Flash

Reach

item.title: [j22] Borderland Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bone Picker
item.description:
Creature — Bird

This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.

Flying, deathtouch

item.title: [j22] Bonders' Enclave
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [j22] Bolt Hound
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Dog

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

Whenever Bolt Hound attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bogardan Dragonheart
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

Sacrifice another creature: Until end of turn, Bogardan Dragonheart becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, and haste.

item.title: [j22] Bloodtracker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying

{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.

When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [j22] Bloodthirsty Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

Flying

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

item.title: [j22] Blood Price
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [j22] Bloodline Pretender
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

As Bloodline Pretender enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever another creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodline Pretender.

item.title: [j22] Bloodhaze Wolverine
item.description:
Creature — Wolverine

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Bloodhaze Wolverine gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bloodbond Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman Ally

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

item.title: [j22] Blood Aspirant
item.description:
Creature — Satyr Berserker

Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Aspirant.

{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Blood Aspirant deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

item.title: [j22] Blisterspit Gremlin
item.description:
Creature — Gremlin

{1}, {T}: Blisterspit Gremlin deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Blisterspit Gremlin.

item.title: [j22] Blisterpod
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Drone

Devoid (This card has no color.)

When Blisterpod dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [j22] Blight Keeper
item.description:
Creature — Bat Imp

Flying

{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Blighted Fen
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Spirits
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Blessed Spirits.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Sanctuary
item.description:
Enchantment

Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Unicorn creature token.

item.title: [j22] Blessed Defiance
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Blaze
item.description:
Sorcery

Blaze deals X damage to any target.
